page.title: 12Church and Chapel
page.content: In Skelton village there is a small Methodist chapel which is still in use, the Methodist congregation goes to the Chapel the first Sunday in every month. There is also the neglected and disused St Helen's Chapel which is falling into serious disrepair. Skelton has a lerge church built to replace St Helen's but it is not in our area. Marton Le Moor has two chapels, one a Methodist, one a Church of England. The Methodist chapel.is no longer in use, it is in fact a house now. The Church of England Church is still in use, having monthly services taken by the clergy at Ripon Cathedral. For details of Kirby Hill Church which is part of the same benefice as Skelton please see page 13.
